titleStmt.title: His Majesties letter to the House of Lords and Commons, writ from St. Germains the 3d of February 1688
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

notesStmt.note: "Given at St. Germains en Laye the 14th. of February 1688/9 and in the fifth year of our reign"--p. 2.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
